Module cz2002_assignment
Package entities

Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
entities.MenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FoodItem, SetPackage
public abstract class MenuItem extends Object implements Serializable
This is the fundamental class that represents the entities displayed on the menu. It gives information of the Menu Item like name, description and price. Base MenuItem object class that encompasses standard information of items on menu. Extended to SetPackages / FoodItems
Author:
JOSHHH
See Also:
Serialized Form
